TextJPN: レナは部活が終わると同時にすっ飛んで帰って行った。
TextENG: As soon as the club activities were finished, Rena flew off.

TextJPN: なんでも、いつも『宝探し』をしている場所でかぁいいものを見つけたらしい。
TextENG: I heard that she found something really nice at the place where he always does her ``treasure hunting``.

TextJPN: だから今日は珍しく、魅音と二人での下校となった。
TextENG: So today it was just Mion and me walking home together, a rather rare occurrence.

TextJPN: 魅音は唇を尖らせながらも、素直に俺の荷物も抱えている。
TextENG: Albeit disgruntled, she did end up faithfully carrying my bag.

TextJPN: 「で、その宝探しの場所がさ。@k@vS19/03/660300057.…向こうの林を越えたゴミ山なんだよね～」
TextENG: ``But yeah, that place she talks about...@k@vS19/03/660300057. It's pretty much a trash heap across those woods over there...``

TextJPN: 魅音はそう言って、呆れたようにやれやれと肩をすくめる。まぁ確かに、年頃の娘が目を輝かせる場所ではないわな……。
TextENG: Mion says, before shrugging in mild exasperation. Yeah, I get it. It's not exactly a place that girls her age should be getting all starry-eyed over.

TextJPN: 「しかし、不法投棄のゴミ山に、宝なんてあるのかよ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI04520.怪我しなきゃいいけどな」
TextENG: ``But what treasure could there even be inside a pile of unlawfully dumped garbage?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI03720. I just hope she doesn't get hurt.``

TextJPN: 「あっははは！@k@vS19/03/660300059.　大丈夫大丈夫、レナも初めてじゃないし。@k@vS19/03/660300060.それに、そこは以前ダムの工事現場だった場所だから、色々あって賑やかなんだよ」
TextENG: ``Hehehe!@k@vS19/03/660300059. Relax, she'll be fine. It's not like it's her first time.@k@vS19/03/660300060. Besides, that's the former dam construction site, so it's bustling with all kinds of stuff there.``

TextJPN: 「賑やか……ねぇ……」
TextENG: ``Bustling...?``

TextJPN: 「色々あったんだよ、戦いとかね！@k@vS19/03/660300062.　座りこみやったりデモをやったり！」
TextENG: ``Yeah, a whole bunch of stuff happened here. Like this great battle!@k@vS19/03/660300062. There were strikes and demonstrations and stuff!``

TextJPN: 戦いとは穏やかじゃない話だが、聞いておこうと思った。
TextENG: Calling it a ``great battle`` makes it sound kinda violent, but I decided to listen all the same.

TextJPN: 魅音は当時の経緯を、身振り手振りを交えて話し出す。
TextENG: And so Mion explained with great gesticulations how the events proceeded back then.

TextJPN: 「この雛見沢を、湖に沈める……か。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI04550.確かに、とんでもない話だよな」
TextENG: ``So they wanted to sink our Hinamizawa into the lake...? You're right, that is awful.``

TextJPN: 「役人どもは本当に一方的だった。@k@vS19/03/660300064.偉そうで威張ってた！@k@vS19/03/660300065.　金で解決できないと悟るとあらゆる嫌がらせをしてきたんだよ？！@k@vS19/03/660300066.　嫌らしいヤツらだった！」
TextENG: ``The government guys were really adamant about it.@k@vS19/03/660300064. Acting all big and full of themselves!@k@vS19/03/660300065. Since they figured out that they couldn't settle it with money, they did a bunch of nasty stuff!@k@vS19/03/660300066. They were nasty guys!``

TextJPN: 魅音はまるで目の前で繰り広げているかのように、声を荒げながら喋る。
TextENG: Mion spoke excitedly, as if the whole thing was happening right in front of her.

TextJPN: 「よく勝てたな…。相手は国だろ？」
TextENG: ``I'm amazed you guys won... You were facing the federal government, right?``

TextJPN: 「村長や村の有力者たちがね、方々に陳情した。@k@vS19/03/660300068.東京にも行ったし、いろんな政治家に根回しもした。@k@vS19/03/660300069.……そうしてる内に計画は撤回されたんだよ。@k@vS19/03/660300070.私たちの完全勝利だった！@k@vS19/03/660300071.　あっはははは！」
TextENG: ``The mayor and prominent figures in the village all signed petitions.@k@vS19/03/660300068. They went to Tokyo and struck deals with legislators...@k@vS19/03/660300069. And as a result, the development plan was retracted.@k@vS19/03/660300070. It was our complete victory!@k@vS19/03/660300071. Ahahahahaha!``

TextJPN: 「暴力沙汰とかには…ならなかったのか？@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI04580.　傷害事件とか…殺人、」
TextENG: ``There wasn't any... violence, was there?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI04580. Like assaults... or murders?``

TextJPN: 「なかった」
TextENG: ``None.``

TextJPN: ぴしゃりと言いきられた。
TextENG: She promptly cut me off.

TextJPN: 奇妙な違和感。
TextENG: I feel a faint malaise.

TextJPN: 言葉にはピリオドがこめられていた。
TextENG: Her words signaled the end of discussion.

TextJPN: それ以上は、立ち入ってほしくないのか。それともあるいは……。
TextENG: Was she signalling to me that she doesn't want me to pry any further? Or could it be that perhaps...

TextJPN: ひょっとしたら、思いつくままに根掘り葉掘り聞くような内容ではなかったのかもしれない。
TextENG: The truth on this matter is truly something she'd want to keep hidden?

TextJPN: 収まりのつかない俺の好奇心は、胸の中で所在なくうなだれていた。
TextENG: My unbridled curiosity sloshes back and forth in the back of my head.

TextJPN: 「何？@k@vS19/03/660300074.　まだ、いじめ足りないって顔じゃん」
TextENG: ``What's up?@k@vS19/03/660300052. You've got that look on your face like you need to be teased.``

TextJPN: 「そ…そんなことねぇよ」
TextENG: ``N...No I don't!``

TextJPN: 「はい、これ。@k@vS19/03/660300076.…おじさん、ちゃーんと圭ちゃんのうちまで荷物持ちしたからね！@k@vS19/03/660300077.　じゃ、また明日ね。バイバイ！」
TextENG: ``Well, here you go.@k@vS19/03/660300076. Your bag has made it to your house!@k@vS19/03/660300077. See you tomorrow. Bye bye!``

TextJPN: そう言うと、うれしそうに走って行ってしまった。
TextENG: She says and merrily runs off.

TextJPN: チェッ、温情かけすぎちゃったかな……でも…女の子だし、ま、いいか。
TextENG: Tch, maybe I went a bit too soft on her... But I mean... she *is* a girl, so I guess it's fine.

TextJPN: ふと見ると、手が真っ黒だった。……あ？　あぁッ？！　持ち手に墨がべっとりと塗られてる！　い、いつの間に？！？！
TextENG: I happened to glance at my hands, when I notice they are pitch black. ...What? WHAaaaAAaT?! The grip is completely smeared with ink! W-When did she have time to do this?!

TextJPN: や…やられた！　魅音のやつ！
TextENG: S-She got me! That punk!

TextJPN: ハッとなって魅音を見ると、こちらを振り向いてアッカンベーをしている？！　さすが魅音、転んでもただでは起きないやつ……。
TextENG: Startled, I look at Mion, just to see her pulling down her eyelid and sticking her tongue out at me! Man, this girl really knows how to make lemonade out of her lemons...
